vulnerability_findings.name: arbitrary-send
vulnerability_findings.message:
WhaleGiveaway2.getFreebie (patch_19.sol#8-13) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- msg.sender.transfer(this.balance) (patch_19.sol#11)

vulnerability_findings.name: external-function
external-function
external-function
solc-version
vulnerability_findings.message:
Detected issues with version pragma in patch_19.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.19 (patch_19.sol#1): it allows old versions

vulnerability_findings.name: low-level-calls
vulnerability_findings.message:
Low level call in WhaleGiveaway2.command (patch_19.sol#23-30):
	-success = adr.call.value(msg.value)(data) patch_19.sol#28
